channel.title: How do I change Exp per Hit on dummy's etc..?
channel.description:
I once knew but forgot.
Please post threads leading to my question, or give me a personal guide. Thanks.
-Stone

item.title: How do I change Exp per Hit on dummy's etc..?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

search

case 823:

youll see somthing like

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Attack The Dummy."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; } break;

change the 60’s or the 30

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change Exp per Hit on dummy's etc..?

item.title: How do I change Exp per Hit on dummy's etc..?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

ok, idk if this is right but try it, and here’s no thread existing that i know of that will help… (anymore) 1st. You search for the dummie’s case… i forget what it is (its the numbers in the first set of ('s when you right click the dummie, so just search that untill you find something like a case or w e and it should say just how much xp is gven and you can change it from there… i’ll try this myself but i dont have xp on dummies, i got it on npcs… so i’ll just use a regular pimpscape source to see if i’m corect!
